Class TERCEWSClient

java.lang.Object
  edu.internet2.hopi.dragon.terce.TERCEWSClient

public class TERCEWSClient
extends java.lang.Object

Class used to issue web service requests to a TERCE server.

Author:
Andrew Lake (alake@internet2.edu)

Method Detail

sendRequest

public TERCEStub.FindPathResponseContent sendRequest(TERCEStub.FindPathContent request)
                                             throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                                                    java.io.IOException,
                                                    TERCEFaultMessageException
Submits a request from the application to the TERCE web servuce server and returns the response.

Parameters:
request - An object representation of the request parameters
Returns:
an object representation of the server's response
Throws:
java.net.UnknownHostException - thrown when unable to connect to the TERCE web service server because the host is not recognized
java.io.IOException - thrown when there is an error reading or writing to the socket connected to the TERCE web service server
TERCEFaultMessageException - thrown when the TERCE web service returns an error

getURL

public java.lang.String getURL()
Returns a string representation of the URL of the web service server

a string representation of the URL of the web service server

Set the URL of the TERCE web service server

Parameters:
url - the URL of the TERCE web service server
